name: Ascendant, a 2.5D roguelike-brawler for the PC
blurb: Bash your way through hordes of zealots, fanatics, and beasts in a bid to overthrow a tyrannical god in this 2.5D roguelike-brawler

rewards.reward: Our eternal love and gratitude . Forever, and ever, and ever. Plus a picture of the team thanking you so you will always know who loves you the most. It's us.

Early Backer Full Digital DRM-Free Edition + In-Game Credit\r\n=============================\r\nReceive Ascendant on release with a 20% early backer limited discount! Your name will also be Digitally Immortalized in the Ascendant game credits! Includes previous rewards.

Full Digital DRM-Free Edition + In-Game Credit\r\n=============================\r\nAvailable on release. Your name will also be Digitally Immortalized in the Ascendant game credits! Includes previous rewards.

2 Copies of the Full Digital DRM-Free Edition 
=============================
One copy for you and one for your friend! You will always be able to play Ascendant's local coop no matter where you are. Available on release. Includes previous rewards. 
=============================
Second copy is not included with higher tier rewards.

Beta access + Set of high-res wallpapers + Soundtrack\r\n=============================\r\nHelp us debug the game by receiving closed beta access to Ascendant! Additionally you will also receive a set of high resolution wallpapers and a digital download of the game's soundtrack!  Includes previous rewards.

Digital Art Pack \r\n=============================\r\nThis tier includes a download of all the concept art, design sketches, and environmental illustrations used in building Ascendant masterfully put together by our artists. Includes previous rewards.
Limited Edition Signed Poster \r\n=============================\r\nWe will send you an 11x17 poster of limited edition art, signed by everyone on the dev team. Includes all previous rewards.

Sword of Fortuna\r\n=============================\r\nYou will have your name added to a pool of names for the Sword of Fortuna, a special, dynamically created weapon. When players pick up the sword, your name will flash on screen as its owner and creator. Includes all previous rewards.

Asset Inspiration\r\n=============================\r\nWe, the Hapa Games dev team, will use a name or theme (within reason) you give us as inspiration to design and construct an in-game item!  Includes all previous rewards.

Limited Edition Pint Glass
============================= We like beer. A lot. And we hope you do too. Even if you don't, you should still check this out! You will receive a very Limited Edition Ascendant Pint Glass for all your drinking needs! Includes all previous rewards.
=============================
Limited Edition Ascendant Pint Glass not included with higher tier rewards.

2x Limited Edition Pint Glass\r\n============================= Get a second Pint Glass to make a set! We like beer. A lot. And we hope you do too. Even if you don't, you should still check this out! You will receive two very Limited Edition Ascendant Pint Glass for all your drinking needs! Includes all previous rewards.

Custom Ascendant Xbox 360 Controller\r\n=============================\r\nOur artists will hand paint an Xbox 360 PC Controller with one of the five available designs! By selecting this reward you will be one of two people IN THE WORLD with this customized controller. Includes all previous rewards.

VIP Guest at the Ascendant Launch Party
=============================
You are cordially invited to attend the Ascendant Launch Party in beautiful downtown Orlando as a VIP with the Hapa Games dev team and friends. We will give you a special tour of our offices, a catered lunch from the delicious 4 Rivers Smokehouse, and a night on the town starting off with one of our favorite spots to unwind after a long day of production; Player 1 Barcade.
=============================
Travel and lodging expenses not included but we'll make sure you have a freaking awesome time.
